duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality evaluation and therapy services for preschool children and students, including compliance with IEPs and all necessary documentation; direct care assignment is typically 50% of the work week.
Provide organizational supervision and mentoring of occupational therapy providers.
Manage occupational therapy caseloads and staffing, make hire/fire recommendations, participate in program teams and planning.

education_certification.credential: New York State license in good standing and current registration as an Occupational Therapist.
Minimum 5 years direct care experience in providing evaluations and intervention with children and people with developmental disabilities; supervisory experience preferred.
Strong verbal and written language skills, and demonstrated ability to work well within a team.
